page.title: 10ECOLOGY
page.content: The Fisheries Lab.was set up in 1950 to study brown trout and investigate methods of improving the stocks for exploitation by anglers.This has now been overtaken by greater interest in Atlantic salmon , studying the effects of over-fishing, seal predation and disease. New strains of fish are researched and some are hatched in special pens. Another important role of the Lab. is the study of pollution and its effects , achieving correction where possible.The lab has participated in several international invesigations into pollution.The lab has also be called in by the Police to investigate the illegal use of cyanide in the catching of fish. About 50 people are employed in a group of buildings including chemistry and micro biology labs.
